result.reason: Common RDP usability gap: nested sessions need a UI action to send Ctrl+Alt+End (maps to Ctrl+Alt+Del on remote) since the keypress is consumed by the outer session.
result.approach: Add toolbar/context-menu action that calls the MSTSCLib ActiveX SendKeys or focus-then-PostMessage with VK_CANCEL sequence to inject Ctrl+Alt+End into the active RDP session window.
